## IMPORTANT: Responsible Disclosure

**For sensitive security issues** (exploits, data exposure, authentication bypass), please email security@payroll-engine.com instead of opening a public issue.

This template is for **non-sensitive security concerns** such as:
- Documentation of potential threat vectors
- Questions about security design decisions
- Suggestions for security improvements
- Reports of security-related warnings in dependencies

---

## Pre-submission checklist

- [ ] I have read [docs/threat_model.md](https://github.com/payroll-engine/payroll-engine/blob/main/docs/threat_model.md)
- [ ] I have read [docs/psp_invariants.md](https://github.com/payroll-engine/payroll-engine/blob/main/docs/psp_invariants.md)
- [ ] This is NOT a sensitive vulnerability that could be exploited (use email for those)
